profileText: a Representative from Missouri; born on November 5, 1974; graduated from Hazelwood East High School, St. Louis, Mo., 1992; attended St. Louis Community College-Florissant Valley, Ferguson, Mo.; B.A., Lindenwood University, Saint Charles, Mo., 2011-2018; J.D., University of Missouri, Columbia, Mo.; faculty member, St. Louis Community College-Florissant Valley, Ferguson, Mo., 2011-2018; municipal judge, Velda City, St. Louis County, Mo.; lawyer; member of the Ferguson, Mo., city council, 2015-2018; St. Louis County, Mo., prosecuting attorney, 2019-2025; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
